articles.description: The financial regulator says it would be easy for customers to build up unseen debts of £1,000.
articles.content:
By Kevin PeacheyPersonal finance correspondent, BBC News
image copyrightGetty Images
Fears over young shoppers' debts mean buy now, pay later firms such as Klarna will face more scrutiny by regulat… [+5368 chars]
